DOC.brief_summary: The principal aim of the study is to evaluate if CBT for insomnia is associated with improvement in the PSG sleep of patients treated in primary care. Furthermore,the relationship between subjectively-assessed sleep and PSG sleep are investigated(at pre-treatment, at post-treatment, in relation to treatment change.
DOC.brief_title: Do People With Insomnia Sleep Better After Psychological Treatment?
DOC.criteria: Meets clinical/RDC criteria for primary insomnia Healthy Adult (18+ years) Evidence of sleep disorders other than insomnia Use of sleeping pills Major Psychopathologies
